alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 17 at 3:10PM EDT until June 17 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 384 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST OHIO GALLIA LAWRENCE IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA BUCHANAN DICKENSON IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA BRAXTON IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA CALHOUN CLAY GILMER JACKSON NICHOLAS ROANE WEBSTER IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA POCAHONTAS IN SOUTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BOONE FAYETTE KANAWHA LINCOLN LOGAN MCDOWELL MINGO PUTNAM RALEIGH WYOMING IN WESTERN WEST VIRGINIA CABELL MASON WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALUM CREEK, BECKLEY, BURNSVILLE, CEREDO, CHAPMANVILLE, CHARLESTON, CLAY, CLINTWOOD, CRAIGSVILLE, FAYETTEVILLE, GALLIPOLIS, GARY, GASSAWAY, GLENVILLE, GRANTSVILLE, GRUNDY, HAMLIN, HARTS, HUNTINGTON, HURRICANE, IRONTON, KENOVA, LAKE VESUVIUS, LOGAN, MADISON, MAN, MARLINTON, MULLENS, NEW HAVEN, OAK HILL, OCEANA, PINEVILLE, POINT PLEASANT, RAVENSWOOD, RICHWOOD, RIPLEY, SAINT ALBANS, SOUTH CHARLESTON, SOUTH POINT, SPENCER, SUMMERSVILLE, SUTTON, TEAYS VALLEY, VANSANT, WAR, WAYNE, WEBSTER SPRINGS, WELCH, AND WILLIAMSON.
